price: Wakizikataa neema tulizo wapa. Basi stareheni. Mtakuja jua!
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Hayo hutokea ili mwisho wao huwa kuikanya fadhila yetu kwa yale tuliyo wapa. Basi enyi makafiri! Stareheni na hayo msiyo yatolea Haki ya shukrani. Mtakuja kuujua mwisho wa ukafiri!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
